projects.name: ChessCord
projects.summary: Play chess with your friends on Discord
projects.description: This is a Discord Bot I single-handedly coded that allows you to play multiplayer chess games, all within a popular chatting platform. It includes support for almost all features available on professional chess sites, including spectating, takebacks, rating tracking, and much more! Best of all, this is condensed into an amazing look and easy experience.

projects.name: Find A Tutor
projects.description: Offer to tutor and find other tutors to learn easily, quickly, and more in-depth.

projects.name: Activity Marathon
projects.description: Due to Covid-19, average physical activity has reached an all-time low. Hopefully this website will help make working out more fun and engaging by allowing users to compete for rewards.

projects.name: My Website
projects.summary: This here thing you're looking at right now
projects.description: A personal website built using Svelte, SvelteKit, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.
